programme.title: Piranha (1978)
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: Piranha (1995)
programme.desc: A government tank containing genetically engineered piranha is unwittingly emptied into a river that flows past a resort area.

programme.title: Twins of Evil
programme.desc: A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Katy, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.

programme.title: The Last Man On Earth
programme.desc: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: After a terrible boating accident killed her family, shy Angela Baker is sent to Camp Arawak. Shortly after her arrival a series of bizarre and violent "accidents" begin to claim the lives of various campers.

programme.title: Dominion: Prequel To The Exorcist
programme.desc: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa.

programme.title: Camp Cold Brook
programme.desc: In a last-ditch effort to spark ratings for his failing show, reality TV host Jack Wilson films his next episode at the infamous Camp Cold Brook, which was host to a horrific incident.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Ben the rat returns to lead a violent rodent army in this 1972 horror sequel to "Willard."

programme.title: Dementia 13
programme.desc: A widow hatches a bold plan to get her hands on the inheritance, unaware that she is targeted by a murderer

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A struggling new father joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.
